name: Lose a Letter Lexicon Ladder Part 4 Trivia Game | Brain Teasers | 10 Questions

questions.text:
Here's a playing tip - If you can't solve the first clue go to one of the others that you can solve, and then work up and down from there.

First word of seven letters.

Clothes makers.

One word of six letters.

In the navy.

One word of five letters.

Relating to the sun.

One word of four letters.

Involving the mouth.

Last word of three letters.

Row, row, row the boat... With what?

New word of six letters

Rapid, without warning.

One word of five letters.

Naked people.

One word of four letters.

Ridge of sand formed by the wind.

One word of three letters.

Conclusion.

Final word of two letters.

A short editor.
